Description: Ostracon, large section of the upper-body of a pale red-brown pottery wine-jar, the interior is partly covered with a light-brown granular deposit, the fabric is grey-black in section, the exterior is covered with a brown-coloured slip, now cracked in parts, and faint traces of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393627) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393627)
